name: Buswell
description:
Buswell is a Downwell-esque game about raising money for the children. Get to the Driver Chair (aka fart sponge) for your shift, but watch out for shame tickets and animated prize packaging golems!

(There's currently no sound, and the Options menu goes nowhere, and the sprites don't animate, and there's some weird behavior to the flying shame tickets, and the in-level UI is a work in progress, and the Omega Shift/Infinite Zeta endgame isn't done yet.)
